mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (declareProject, declareNumber, declareFraction, declareScale, declareArrange, declareAssess, declareSurveying, declarePlan, contract, declareCompany, declareName, declarePhone, finishTime, quality, bid, responsibilityName, responsibilityPhone) VALUES(#{declareProject}, #{declareNumber}, #{declareFraction}, #{declareScale}, #{declareArrange}, #{declareAssess}, #{declareSurveying}, #{declarePlan}, #{contract}, #{declareCompany}, #{declareName}, #{declarePhone}, #{finishTime}, #{quality}, #{bid}, #{responsibilityName}, #{responsibilityPhone} )
